Questions.Question: Would you rather live in a bustling city or a quiet countryside?
Would you rather have endless summer or perpetual winter?
Pizza or pasta?
Would you rather travel to the past or the future?
Beach vacation or mountain retreat?
Would you rather have the ability to fly or be invisible?
Would you rather explore outer space or the depths of the ocean?
Movie night in or night out at the theater?
Would you rather have the power of super strength or super speed?
Early bird or night owl?
Would you rather have a teleportation ability or time travel ability?
Would you rather have the power of telekinesis or mind reading?
Book or movie?
Summer or winter Olympics?
Would you rather have unlimited money or unlimited time?
Game night or karaoke night?
Do you prefer coffee or tea?
Do you like to read fiction or non-fiction books?
Are you more of a dog person or a cat person?
Do you prefer sunny days or rainy days?
Are you someone who enjoys cooking at home or dining out?
Do you like action-packed movies or romantic comedies?
Are you a fan of sweet or savory snacks?
Do you enjoy listening to music while working or prefer silence?
Are you someone who prefers to plan everything in advance or go with the flow?
Socks with sandals or crocs with socks?
Would you rather have the ability to fly but only at walking speed or run as fast as a cheetah but only for 10 seconds at a time?
Questions.Answer2: Run as fast as a cheetah for 10 seconds

Questions.Question: Always have to sing instead of speak or dance instead of walk?
Would you rather have edible spaghetti hair that regrows every night or sweat maple syrup?
Wear a cape everywhere you go or always wear a top hat?
Would you rather have fingers as long as your legs or legs as long as your fingers?
Always have to whisper or always have to shout?
Would you rather have a pet dragon or a pet unicorn?
Would you rather have the ability to talk to plants or control the weather?
Eat a spoonful of wasabi every day or a whole raw onion every week?
Questions.Answer2: Eat a raw onion every week

Questions.Question: Would you rather have a rewind button for your life or a pause button?
Have the ability to teleport but always end up 10 feet above the ground or be able to breathe underwater but only in a bathtub?
Questions.Answer2: Breathe underwater but only in a bathtub

Questions.Question: Would you rather have an extra arm or an extra leg?
Have a permanently itchy nose or a constantly dripping nose?
Would you rather have a tail like a cat or ears like a rabbit?
Speak every language fluently but only in rhymes or communicate with animals but only through interpretive dance?
Questions.Answer2: Communicate with animals through interpretive dance

Questions.Question: Always have a clown following you or always have a chicken riding on your shoulder?
Questions.Answer2: Always have a chicken riding on your shoulder

Questions.Question: Would you rather have x-ray vision but can't turn it off or have the ability to see 10 seconds into the future but can't change it?
Would you rather never be able to use social media again or never be able to watch another movie or TV show?
Questions.Answer2: Never watch another movie or TV show

Questions.Question: Would you rather have the ability to breathe underwater but only in a bathtub or be able to talk to plants but only during a full moon?
Questions.Answer1: Breathe underwater but only in a bathtub
Questions.Answer2: Talk to plants but only during a full moon

Questions.Question: Would you rather only be able to whisper for the rest of your life or only be able to shout?
Would you rather have unlimited money but live in a world without books or have unlimited books but live in a world without money?
Would you rather live in a world where everyone's emotions are visible above their heads or where everyone's thoughts are audible?
Would you rather be able to control fire or water?
Would you rather have the power of super strength but only when you're asleep or the power of flight but only when you're awake?
Would you rather always have to wear socks with sandals or always have to wear your clothes inside out?
Would you rather have the ability to talk to animals but they only speak in riddles or be able to communicate with plants but they only sing show tunes?
Questions.Answer1: Talk to animals speaking in riddles
Questions.Answer2: Communicate with plants singing show tunes

Questions.Question: Would you rather have to eat everything with chopsticks or with your hands?
Would you rather be able to control the weather but only in your immediate vicinity or be able to control time but only by one hour forward or backward?
Questions.Answer2: Control time by one hour forward or backward

Questions.Question: Would you rather have the ability to read minds but everyone can hear your thoughts too or be able to turn invisible but you can't control when it happens?
Questions.Answer1: Read minds but everyone can hear your thoughts
Questions.Answer2: Turn invisible but can't control when

Questions.Question: Would you rather have the ability to change the color of anything you touch or the ability to make any object small enough to fit in your pocket?
Questions.Answer1: Change the color of anything you touch
Questions.Answer2: Make any object small enough to fit in your pocket

Questions.Question: Would you rather have your dream job but never have time for personal relationships or have a job you hate but have a loving family and friends?
Questions.Answer1: Dream job but never have time for personal relationships
Questions.Answer2: Hate your job but have a loving family and friends

Questions.Question: Would you rather always have to wear a clown wig or a giant foam cowboy hat?
Questions.Answer2: Always wear a giant foam cowboy hat

Questions.Question: Would you rather have the ability to speak to technology (computers, phones, etc.) but they're all sarcastic or be able to understand animals but they only speak in puns?
Questions.Answer1: Speak to technology but they're all sarcastic
Questions.Answer2: Understand animals but they only speak in puns

Questions.Question: Would you rather have to eat dessert before every meal or never eat dessert again?
Would you rather be able to control your dreams but always have nightmares or have no control over your dreams but always have pleasant dreams?
Questions.Answer1: Control dreams but always have nightmares
Questions.Answer2: No control over dreams but always have pleasant dreams

Questions.Question: Would you rather have the ability to talk to ghosts but they're always complaining about the afterlife or be able to see into the future but only five minutes ahead?
Questions.Answer1: Talk to ghosts but they're always complaining
Questions.Answer2: See into the future but only five minutes ahead

Questions.Question: Would you rather have the ability to travel anywhere in the world instantaneously but you always arrive naked or be able to fly but only two feet off the ground?
Questions.Answer1: Travel anywhere but always arrive naked
Questions.Answer2: Fly but only two feet off the ground

Questions.Question: Would you rather have the ability to breathe fire but burn your tongue every time?
Questions.Answer1: Breathe fire but burn tongue every time
Questions.Answer2: Not have the ability to breathe fire

Questions.Question: Are you more likely to befriend a sentient robot or a time-traveling pigeon?
Are you the type to wear socks on your hands or gloves on your feet?
Are you more intrigued by the idea of living in a house shaped like a giant avocado or a castle made entirely of cheese?
Questions.Answer1: Living in a house shaped like a giant avocado
Questions.Answer2: Living in a castle made entirely of cheese

Questions.Question: Are you more likely to survive in a world where gravity occasionally reverses or where objects randomly turn into rubber ducks?
Questions.Answer2: Objects randomly turn into rubber ducks

Questions.Question: Are you someone who would prefer to communicate through interpretive dance or Morse code?
Are you the type to have a pet octopus that can juggle or a pet giraffe that can tap dance?
Questions.Answer2: Pet giraffe that can tap dance

Questions.Question: Are you more likely to find yourself trapped in a giant bubble filled with tapioca pudding or a maze made of jellybeans?
Questions.Answer1: Trapped in a giant bubble filled with tapioca pudding
Questions.Answer2: Trapped in a maze made of jellybeans

Questions.Question: Are you someone who would rather have a third eye that sees into parallel dimensions or a third ear that hears extraterrestrial whispers?
Questions.Answer1: Have a third eye that sees into parallel dimensions
Questions.Answer2: Have a third ear that hears extraterrestrial whispers

Questions.Question: Are you the type to ride a skateboard powered by hamsters or a unicycle with jet propulsion?
Questions.Answer1: Ride a skateboard powered by hamsters
Questions.Answer2: Ride a unicycle with jet propulsion

Questions.Question: Are you more likely to have a houseplant that recites Shakespeare or a pet rock that predicts the future?
Questions.Answer1: Have a houseplant that recites Shakespeare
Questions.Answer2: Have a pet rock that predicts the future

Questions.Question: Are you someone who would rather have a wardrobe that teleports you to random locations or a refrigerator that dispenses endless pizza?
Questions.Answer1: Have a wardrobe that teleports you to random locations
Questions.Answer2: Have a refrigerator that dispenses endless pizza

Questions.Question: Are you more intrigued by the idea of having a talking toaster that offers philosophical advice or a sentient toothbrush that tells bad jokes?
Questions.Answer1: Talking toaster that offers philosophical advice
Questions.Answer2: Sentient toothbrush that tells bad jokes

Questions.Question: Are you someone who would rather explore an underwater city populated by mermaids or a floating island inhabited by sentient clouds?
Questions.Answer1: Explore an underwater city populated by mermaids
Questions.Answer2: Explore a floating island inhabited by sentient clouds

Questions.Question: Would you rather be a whale or a lion?
Would you rather have every traffic light turn green or always have the best parking spot?
Questions.Answer1: Have every traffic light turn green
Questions.Answer2: Always have the best parking spot

Questions.Question: Would you rather have slow internet or always forget your passwords?
Would you rather sail or van life around the world?
Would you rather always be two hours early or 20 minutes late?
Would you rather travel to West-Europe or to East-Europe?
Would you rather travel to North-America or to South-America?
Would you rather travel to Oceania or Asia?
